nodes.text: House Kallea was a noble house on Brentaal IV. Members of the house included Olun and Henne Kallea, and their daughter Freia Kallea. Freia's parents wished her to marry into a higher ranked house, though she had planned to apprentice in the Brentaal Spacefarers League to their disapproval. Kallea's best friend was whom she thought was a mild errand boy for House Brentioch, but was in fact the seneschal Sival Brentioch of that house.
